definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

pinyin: Xi1 an1 Dian4 zi3 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: He clipped an electronic pulse reader tohis finger.
sentences.chinese: 他把电子脉搏计夹到手指上。

sentences.english: For example, an electronic book for $30 could be sold to your prospects.
sentences.chinese: 例如，电子书籍可以出售给你30元的前景。

sentences.english: Virus-infected emails struck fear into the Microsoft Company.
sentences.chinese: 携带病毒的电子邮件引起了微软公司的恐慌。

sentences.english: Please click here for past issues of "e-Newsletter".
sentences.chinese: 查阅前期《电子快讯》请按此。
我们的电子服务才是关键。

sentences.english: EA brings MONOPOLY's new card game to mobile.
sentences.chinese: 电子艺界垄断带来的新游戏移动。

sentences.english: Today, many e-wastes added into national hazardous waste list.
sentences.chinese: 今天，许多电子废物上了国家危险废物名录。

sentences.english: So on Friday, we'll start with talking about the wave functions for the multi-electron atoms.
sentences.chinese: 在周五，我们要开始讨论，多电子原子的波函数。

sentences.english: Applying the market rule to electronic unfair competition disputes is not always easy.
sentences.chinese: 运用该市场规律来消除电子不正当竞争并不容易。

sentences.english: It has high value in the comprehensive experiments of electronic circuits.
sentences.chinese: 在电子电路综合型实验中，有较高的应用价值。

sentences.english: I do my e-mail on a 20-inch liquid crystal display (LCD) monitor.
sentences.chinese: 现在我在20英寸的液晶显示器上发电子邮件。

sentences.english: "Electronics are a lot easier to compare online, " Robertson said.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特森认为，“网上更容易比较电子产品的价格。

sentences.english: Our peripheries are the professional markets of cellular phone accessories and the electronics product export.
sentences.chinese: 我们的周边是手机配件及电子产品出口的专业市场。

sentences.english: The group doped its germanium with phosphorous, which has five outer electrons.
sentences.chinese: 这个团队对锗进行了磷原子掺杂，它含有5个电子。

sentences.english: The community's electronic eye has left the thieves nowhere to hide.
sentences.chinese: 社区电子眼，令小偷小摸无处遁形。

sentences.english: Clear the Electronic balance and Weights gauge by alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 用酒精对电子称及砝码进行清洁。

definition: positron/also called 正電子|正电子[zheng4 dian4 zi3]
